extop-sub: With reviews, ratings and Verification, HomeStars gives you the tools you need to hire with confidence.
extop-1: Get matched with 3 pros directly or research yourself from a list of verified and reviewed pros
extop-2: Read reviews and browse project photos submitted by homeowners in your area.
extop-3: Pros with a Verified Badge have passed a credit check, criminal background check and are licensed.
exb-sub: Stop calling around. HomeStars sends pros straight to your inbox.
exb-1: Chat directly with available pros interested in your project
exb-2: Discuss project details, costs and timelines
exb-3: Compare quotes and hire with confidence
